title: Mbitr
author: Mbitr
content: Auction 3 Lots Lot 1Ballet Litecoin Edition signed by Charlie LeeSerial number - AA060015 Ref thread - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5200759.100Lot 2Papersafe wallet serial number ending in ..400Lot 3Papersafe wallet Serial number ending in …798Usual apologies for shit images !AUCTION TERMSBidding in BTC only Starting bid for each item 0.00000BTC Grab a bargain Bidding format -Lot  1. 0.0001                      -Lot  2. 0.0001   etc Min bid increments 0.0001BTCEnd Time - Sunday 13th November  at 7pm GMTSniping - any bid made in the last 10 mins, will increase the auction time by 10 mins from that last bid , eg, if a  bid comes in at 6.57 , the New end time will be 7.07 and only for that particular item.Postage from Europe and is FREE I will reach out to the winner via pm with all relevant details . Careful of scammers. Check all links - I will only PM after the auction has ended and ONLY if you win. Escrow paid by the buyer .Thanks to all forum members whose auction templates I’ve borrowed/ stolen/ bastardised- too many to mention.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Reserved for feck ups and EDITS

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Thanks for all the bids folks  Highest bids so far Lot 1 - 0.001BTC  Amax16Lot 2 - 0.001BTC  Amax16Lot 3 - 0.0001BTC  bitbollo

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Highest bids …Lot 1 - 0.0011BTC 123DaveLot 2 - 0.001BTCAmax16Lot 3 - 0.0001BTCbitbolloThanks for the bids folks

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Lot 3. .0003 btcedit:regarding lot 1, unfortunately I do not know the signature of charlie lee and I cannot verify whether it is original or not. is there any certificate / proof that is really his signature? @Mbitr

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: And Auction over - thanks for all the bids folks  Winners are - Lot 1 - 0.0012BTC Amax16Lot 2 - 0.001 BTC Amax16 Lot 3 - 0.0003BTC bitbolloAs far as Charlie Lee’s signature - if you have a look at the thread in the OP, it’s explained there. I suppose you’ve got to hope that it’s genuine otherwise there would have been a lot of folks scammed for a charity  PMs coming soon to the winners

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: as it came from the auction hosted by anonymous miner (can see that the serial number of the above wallet is the same as the one won by Mbitr in the auction) and coblee (Charlie Lee) was in on the thread, I would say that you can trust that is Charlies signature.
